item.title: By: Kim M
item.dc:creator: Kim M
item.description: My friend made this and I loved it. There was none left! It's the best recipe but she's used proactive Margarine in place of the butter.
item.content:encoded: My friend made this and I loved it. There was none left! It’s the best recipe but she’s used proactive Margarine in place of the butter.

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
Hi Simon - :) Hehehe, I keep all the leftovers for work... maybe next time :P
Hi Steph - yep, time to start making some Banana bread!!!
Hi Arwen - Mmmmm, toasted banana bread, just had some this afternoon... and it was great!!!
Hi Parita - Thanks! :)
Hi Maria - The whole house smelt beautiful!
Hi Lorraine - It's great they can still be used, I hate wasting food.
Hi Jeena - Thanks, the riper the tastier and easier :P
Hi Alexandra - Haven't tried it??!! Try it now, try it now!!
Hi Julia - Mmmm, a smoothy sounds great, but mine are left to go too far for that... I think...

Hi Steph – yep, time to start making some Banana bread!!!

Hi Maria – The whole house smelt beautiful!

Hi Lorraine – It’s great they can still be used, I hate wasting food.

Hi Jeena – Thanks, the riper the tastier and easier ðŸ˜›

Hi Alexandra – Haven’t tried it??!! Try it now, try it now!!

Hi Julia – Mmmm, a smoothy sounds great, but mine are left to go too far for that… I think…

item.title: By: Julia @ MÃ©langer
item.dc:creator: Julia @ MÃ©langer
item.description: I'm completely with you. Bananas are rarely ever too far gone. I am so the same. I either make banana bread, or quickly freeze the bananas once they are too far gone to eat, to use in a smoothy later! Beautiful breads! :)
item.content:encoded: I’m completely with you. Bananas are rarely ever too far gone. I am so the same. I either make banana bread, or quickly freeze the bananas once they are too far gone to eat, to use in a smoothy later! Beautiful breads! ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.dc:creator: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.description: banana bread is my favourite! but I've never attempted to make it...will try out your recipe :)
item.content:encoded: banana bread is my favourite! but I’ve never attempted to make it…will try out your recipe ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Jeena
item.dc:creator: Jeena
item.description:
I love your banana bread, love the colour of the centre, love the texture, its just totally scrummy.
I always use really old bananas like you, no point in wasting good food the riper the better. :-)
item.content:encoded:
I love your banana bread, love the colour of the centre, love the texture, its just totally scrummy.

I always use really old bananas like you, no point in wasting good food the riper the better. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: I hate wasting food too but love the fact hat bananas can be used in banana bread and cakes even when they're beyond eating by themselves. It looks wonderful Anita! :)
item.content:encoded: I hate wasting food too but love the fact hat bananas can be used in banana bread and cakes even when they’re beyond eating by themselves. It looks wonderful Anita! ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: Your banana bread looks so dense and moist, exactly how I like it. I could just imagine the smell coming from your oven when this was cooking. hmmmm, it just perfect toasted with HEAPS of butter spread ontop
item.content:encoded: Your banana bread looks so dense and moist, exactly how I like it. I could just imagine the smell coming from your oven when this was cooking. hmmmm, it just perfect toasted with HEAPS of butter spread ontop

item.title: By: parita
item.dc:creator: parita
item.description: I too made banana bread this weekend..yours look so moist and baked beautifully...
item.content:encoded: I too made banana bread this weekend..yours look so moist and baked beautifully…

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: Never too far gone is right. Overripe bananas have such a strong flavour, so they're ideal for cooking. Toasted banana bread sounds very appealing in the cold.
item.content:encoded: Never too far gone is right. Overripe bananas have such a strong flavour, so they’re ideal for cooking. Toasted banana bread sounds very appealing in the cold.

item.title: By: Steph
item.dc:creator: Steph
item.description: Mmm that looks perfect! I've had banana bread cravings so bad recently, I just bought a new loaf pan so I'll be making some soon too :)
item.content:encoded: Mmm that looks perfect! I’ve had banana bread cravings so bad recently, I just bought a new loaf pan so I’ll be making some soon too ðŸ™‚
